definition: the act of pressing one thing on or into the surface of another
details:
noun
- the act of pressing one thing on or into the surface of another
= example: the act of pressing one thing on or into the surface of another
- an impressionistic portrayal of a person
= example: an impressionistic portrayal of a person
- (dentistry) an imprint of the teeth and gums in wax or plaster
= example: (dentistry) an imprint of the teeth and gums in wax or plaster
- an outward appearance
= example: an outward appearance
= synonyms: effect
- a vague idea in which some confidence is placed
= example: a vague idea in which some confidence is placed
= synonyms: feeling
- a clear and telling mental image
= synonyms: picture, mental picture
- all the copies of a work printed at one time
= synonyms: printing
- a symbol that is the result of printing or engraving
= synonyms: stamp
- a concavity in a surface produced by pressing
= example: a concavity in a surface produced by pressing
= synonyms: depression
